reviewText: For those who doubted or criticized the earthquakes in the Heartland in the Book of Mormon, this is a must see.
Used it for a geology course. A bit sensational at times but gets the message across about the threat of New Madrid earthquakes in the future.
DVD is well done but the video used is sometimes repeated. Quality is good and gives nice detail on earthquakes in the mid-west.
This is a great movie that is educational and entertaining. I recommend it to everyone especailly if you live in the Souteast region of the United States.
